title: Automated Synthesis of Ligatures for Arbitrary Fonts
content:
I would appreciate if you could fill in this short survey below about generating ligatures automatically as part of my final year project for my Degree in ICT, Thanks I really appreciate it :)

[http://autoligatures.limequery.com/index.php/527549/lang/en](http://web.archive.org/web/20140803141900/http:/autoligatures.limequery.com/index.php/527549/lang/en "http://autoligatures.limequery.com/index.php/527549/lang/en")

Best Regards

Patrcik
author: patrickattard
